allow: Bash(powershell.exe -Command "wmic process where name=''node.exe'' get ProcessId,CommandLine /format:list 2>&1")

Bash("C:/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d Sankyaan -c "SELECT table_name, \(xpath\(''/row/cnt/text\(\)'', query_to_xml\(''SELECT COUNT\(*\) AS cnt FROM '' || quote_ident\(table_name\), false, true, ''''\)\)\)[1]::text::int AS row_count FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = ''public'' AND table_name LIKE ''portfolio_%'' ORDER BY table_name;")
